sourcesContent: import React from'react';import View from"react-native-web/dist/exports/View";import StyleSheet from"react-native-web/dist/exports/StyleSheet";import CloseButton from"./CloseButton";var styles=StyleSheet.create({container:{flexDirection:'row',alignItems:'center'}});export var HeaderModal=function HeaderModal(props){var withFilter=props.withFilter,withCloseButton=props.withCloseButton,closeButtonImage=props.closeButtonImage,closeButtonStyle=props.closeButtonStyle,closeButtonImageStyle=props.closeButtonImageStyle,onClose=props.onClose,renderFilter=props.renderFilter;return React.createElement(View,{style:styles.container},withCloseButton&&React.createElement(CloseButton,{image:closeButtonImage,style:closeButtonStyle,imageStyle:closeButtonImageStyle,onPress:onClose}),withFilter&&renderFilter(props));};HeaderModal.defaultProps={withCloseButton:true};
